divs: sighting detailson 7\5\12 at approximately 8 pm, i stopped my car in front of my house to shift into reverse so i could back into my driveway and garage. floating over a nieghbor's house across the street about 50' away and 50' off the ground was an oval shaped dull black object approximately 5' high and 3' wide with a single solid red light on the bottom. i got out of my car to look at it and it seemed to hesitate as if it was aware of me watching it. after about 30 seconds i got back in my car to retrieve my cell phone to try to take a video of the object. by the time i had got my phone out and ready to record (a few seconds) the object had moved northeast and was now approximately 1,000' away and was moving fast. i backed my car into my garage and then saw a black helicopter speeding by toward the direction of the object.
Summary: 5' high 3' wide floating dull black object with single red light on bottom seemed to be aware of me watching it
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Plainfield
There were no other sightings in Plainfield on or around July 5th 2012
